# File lib/innate/node.rb, line 383
    def find_provide(path)
      pr = provides

      name, wish, engine = path, 'html', pr['html_handler']

      pr.find do |key, value|
        key = key[/(.*)_handler$/, 1]
        next unless path =~ /^(.+)\.#{key}$/i
        name, wish, engine = $1, key, value
      end

      return name, wish, engine
    end
